head.script: var pkBaseURL = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://webalizer.encuestame.org/piwik/" : "http://webalizer.encuestame.org/piwik/"); document.write(unescape("%3Cscript src='" + pkBaseURL + "piwik.js' type='text/javascript'%3E%3C/script%3E"));
head.title: Encuestame Java Open Source Survey System, Twitter, Poll, Surveys.

meta.name: description
meta.content: encuestame is a Survey Software specialized in creating online Surveys. But not only Surveys, you will also have the opportunity to get the user opinions in different ways, as well as sharing and collecting information trough social network applications like twitter, facebook or in your own website if you wish.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: survey, java, open source, poll, twitter, facebook, google, spring framework, social, dojo
